oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An Isoperimetric inequality for an integral operator on flat tori
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Osting, Braxton
Marzuola, Jeremy L.
Cherkaev, Elena
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Spectral Theory
35P05, 45P05, 52B60, 58C40
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider a class of Hilbert-Schmidt integral operators with an isotropic, stationary kernel acting on square integrable functions defined on flat tori. For any fixed kernel which is positive and decreasing, we show that among all unit-volume flat tori, the equilateral torus maximizes the operator norm and the Hilbert-Schmidt norm.
Comment: 18 pages, 7 figures, contains an English translation of Fejes-Toth Moment Theorem, reviewer comments incorporated, minor typos fixed
